question: If this is a grand slam which must it be? Choices: wimbledon, french open, australian open, us open
generated_rationale: The correct answer is Wimbledon. Wimbledon is the oldest and most prestigious of the four Grand Slam tennis tournaments. It is held annually at the All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club in Wimbledon, London, England. The other Grand Slam tournaments are the Australian Open, held in Melbourne, Australia; the French Open, held in Paris, France; and the US Open, held in New York City, United States.
